column2: Estimated value of a customer over their lifetime with the company
Customer's response to whether they are willing to get another insurance contract
Type of coverage purchased (e.g., Basic, Extended, Premium)
Highest level of education achieved by the customer
Employment status of the customer (e.g., Employed, Unemployed)
Code representing the customer's location type (e.g., Suburban, Rural)
Marital status of the customer (e.g., Single, Married)
Monthly premium paid for auto insurance
Number of months since the customer's last insurance claim
Number of months since the policy was first initiated
Number of open complaints made by the customer
Number of policies held by the customer
Total amount claimed by the customer
Size of the vehicle (e.g., Small, Medsize, Large)
